short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal LinkedIn AI assistant. Supercharge your LinkedIn engagement with EngageWithAI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your LinkedIn Influence with AI-Driven Social Engagement.

Maximize your social media efficiency with our ChatGPT-powered Chrome extension, designed to help you reach more accounts with less effort.


Key Features:

- Generate Engaging Comments on Linkedin:
Unlock the power of AI-generated comments on LinkedIn and customize the tone to perfectly match your desired engagement style, effortlessly enhancing your connections and interactions. 

- Simplified LinkedIn Engagement:
Effortlessly navigate and engage on LinkedIn with our intuitive tools designed to simplify your social media interactions. Streamline your workflow, build meaningful connections, and make your presence known in the professional realm with ease. 

- AI-Powered Post Scheduling:
Automate and optimize your LinkedIn content strategy with our AI-driven post scheduling feature. Schedule and publish compelling posts at the optimal times to maximize visibility, engagement, and impact. Take control of your LinkedIn presence and unlock the potential of AI-assisted scheduling for seamless social media management. 



Benefits:

- Save Time, Engage More:
Our tool streamlines your social media engagement process, saving you valuable time. Instead of spending hours crafting responses, let our AI do the heavy lifting. Engage more, stress less.

- Leverage the Power of ChatGPT:
Our tool utilizes the advanced capabilities of ChatGPT to generate insightful comment suggestions. It's like having a personal AI assistant that knows just what to say.

- Simple and Intuitive:
With a user-friendly interface and easy-to-understand features, our tool is designed for everyone. Whether you're a social media novice or a seasoned pro, you'll find it a breeze to use.

- Advanced AI Written Posts:
Experience the power of advanced AI-written posts that captivate your audience and save you time. Let our AI generate compelling content tailored to your brand, helping you establish a strong online presence effortlessly.

- Weekly Automation & Goal Setting:
Streamline your social media strategy with our weekly automation and goal-setting feature. Our AI reviews past performance and prepares tailored content to help you achieve your goals for the week ahead.

- Chrome Extension:
Enhance your social media engagement with our user-friendly Chrome extension. Seamlessly integrate our tools into your browsing experience and unlock a world of streamlined social media interactions.



Installation & Setup:

Installing and setting up EngageWithAI is a straightforward process. Currently, the extension is compatible with Google Chrome, which ensures a wide range of users can benefit from its features.

- Step 1:
Register on engagewithai.com

- Step 2:
Setup your free account and link your LinkedIn profile for better AI-suggested posts

- Step 3: 
Install the EngageWithAI Google Chrome extension

- Step 4: Use it on your LinkedIn to generate AI comments and posts directly on your LinkedIn



Pricing & Plans:

Currently, we are in the early beta phase, so we do not offer any paid plans at the moment. However, upon the official launch of our beta, we will be introducing a lifetime deal. Additionally, after the beta phase concludes, we will be introducing our paid subscription plans.


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):

- How does the EngageWithAI Chrome extension work?
The EngageWithAI Chrome extension utilizes advanced AI algorithms to generate personalized comment suggestions for social media platforms like LinkedIn. Simply install the extension, browse social media posts, and let AI provide you with insightful and engaging comment ideas.

- Can I customize the generated comments to match my style and tone?
Absolutely! EngageWithAI allows you to customize the generated comments to align with your desired style and tone. Personalize the suggestions before posting to ensure they reflect your unique voice.

- Which social media platforms does EngageWithAI support?
Currently, EngageWithAI focuses on providing comment suggestions for LinkedIn posts. However, we are continuously expanding our capabilities to include other platforms in the future.

- How does the EngageWithAI Chrome extension work?
comment suggestions for social media platforms like LinkedIn. Simply install the extension, browse social media posts, and let AI provide you with insightful and engaging comment ideas.

- How secure is my data when using EngageWithAI?
We prioritize the security and privacy of your data. EngageWithAI adheres to strict data protection standards and does not store or share any personal information. Rest assured that your data remains confidential and secure.

- How can I provide feedback or report any issues during the beta phase?
We value your feedback! You can provide feedback or report any issues you encounter by reaching out to our support team. We appreciate your input as it helps us improve and deliver the best possible experience for our users.
